org.miness.jloglib
Class JLLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.miness.jloglib.JLLogger

public final class JLLogger
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the logger of JLogLib.
It is a singleton, hence there's only one instance at runtime (held by this class itself).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Michel Neeser
